name: uniswap-base
description: Uniswap V3 swap collector for Base L2. Subscribes to Swap events via WebSocket, tracks top pools by volume, and publishes tradeExecuted events to NATS.

jobs.name: stream
jobs.description: Maintain WebSocket connection to Base L2 RPC for real-time Uniswap V3 swap events.

jobs.name: collectSwaps
jobs.description: Fetch recent Uniswap V3 swap events via eth_getLogs and persist into mod_uniswap_base.swaps.
